title: UPDATE: Bobby Shmurda Calls From Jail, Addresses Bail Status: “I’m Hearing Wild Rumors Going On” [Audio]
text: UPDATE: Bobby Shmurda Calls From Jail, Addresses Bail Status: “I’m Hearing Wild Rumors Going On” [Audio] Saturday, 24 October 2015 (20 minutes ago) New York rapper Bobby Shmurda has updated fans on his situation amid widespread rumors about Epic Records not wanting to bail him out of jail. Shmurda called into New York radio station Hot 97 heading into the weekend to clear the air. “I’m hearing wild rumors going on. I’m hearing a lot of rumors and […] The post UPDATE: Bobby Shmurda Calls From Jail, Addresses Bail Status: “I’m Hearing Wild Rumors Going On” [Audio] appeared first on For The Best In Hip-Hop News - SOHH.com.
